problem_names:
lemma DEFL_app_mono [simp, intro]:
  "DEFL('a) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b) \<Longrightarrow> DEFL('a\<cdot>'t::tycon) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b\<cdot>'t)"
translations:
lemma DEFL_app_mono [simp, intro]:
  "DEFL('a) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b) \<Longrightarrow> DEFL('a\<cdot>'t::tycon) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b\<cdot>'t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. DEFL('a) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b) \<Longrightarrow>
    DEFL('a\<cdot>'t) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b\<cdot>'t)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. DEFL('a) \<sqsubseteq> DEFL('b) \<Longrightarrow>
    TC('t)\<cdot>DEFL('a) \<sqsubseteq> TC('t)\<cdot>DEFL('b)
